explanation: The total CO2e emissions for the MacBook Pro 14-inch with M4 (512GB) were calculated as follows: Material extraction and processing emissions were estimated based on the percentage composition of each material and their respective emission factors. Aluminum alloy (40%) contributes significantly due to its high energy-intensive smelting process. Glass (20%) and plastics (15%) also have notable emissions from high-temperature processing. Manufacturing emissions are directly given as 120 kg CO2e. Transportation and distribution emissions were assumed to be 10% of manufacturing emissions, totaling 12 kg CO2e. End-of-life disposal emissions were estimated at 5% of manufacturing emissions, totaling 6 kg CO2e. All emissions were converted to CO2e using GWP values from the IPCC. The calculations follow GHG Protocol Product Standard, ISO 14040/14044, PAS 2050, and ISO/TS 14067 guidelines.
